title: Samsungâ€™s Galaxy Book 2 pre-orders come with a free gaming monitor
content:
Samsung has officially opened pre-orders for the Galaxy Book 2 and Galaxy Book 2 Pro series. And to make an already great laptop even more enticing, you can get a free gaming monitor when you pre-order any of the new Galaxy Book models. The monitor you get depends on what laptop you buy, with the

The post Samsung’s Galaxy Book 2 pre-orders come with a free gaming monitor appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has opened pre-orders for the new Galaxy Book 2 series, and you can get a free gaming monitor if you buy one ahead of the launch.
